Chris brings over 30 years of leadership experience, including as CFO of Microsoft and General Motors, and as Deputy Chief of Staff during the first Trump administration.

tweets.originalText:
We're seeing incredible agents work with Kimi K2.5, from OpenClaw to complex agent swarm.
And we heard you: for heavy agent use, the lower tiers hit their limits too fast.
Meet Allegro. Same Kimi K2.5 that powers every tier: 1T params, native multimodal. No model held back by https://t.co/sARw8jrYTH
